content: beginning chain 28 shells - 84 sts  from round 3 repeat round 2 until you get the desired length hat brim  round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet in the next 5 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch *single_crochet in the 6 next stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * do not join 96 single_crochet  round 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 96 single_crochet  round 3 *single_crochet in the 7 next stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 108 single_crochet  round 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 108 single_crochet  round 5 *single_crochet in the 8 next stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 120 single_crochet  round 6 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 120 single_crochet  round 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 120 single_crochet  round 8 *single_crochet in the 9 next stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 132 single_crochet  round 9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 132 single_crochet  round 10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 132 single_crochet  round 11 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 132 single_crochet slip_stitch or reverse single_crochet all around the last round weave in all ends © kool stitch 2011 this pattern is for personal use only rose pattern chain 75 row 1 chain 1 2 single_crochet in the same chain 2 single_crochet in the next chain 1 half_double_crochet and 1 double_crochet in the next chain 2 double_crochet in each of the next 4 chs *1 double_crochet in the next chain 2 double_crochet in the next chain repeat from * until the last 3 chs 1 double_crochet in the next chain 2 half_double_crochet in the next chain 1 single_crochet in the last chain turn row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st 1 half_double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next st *2 half_double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat from * 2 more times 2 half_double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next st **2 half_double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in each of the next 4
